To help improve our course and gather feedback on perspectives about climate and the environment, please complete the **anonymous Environmental Economics Survey**.  

- The survey is short (about 10 minutes).  
- Your responses are anonymous and will only be used for teaching purposes.  
- Please answer thoughtfully and honestly; there are no right or wrong answers.  

**Deadline:** Please submit your responses by December 9, 2025, 5:00 P.M.
